[[Tighfield]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1365}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family=[[Gamgee Family|Gamgee]] | parentage=[[Gaffer Gamgee]] and [[Bell Goodchild]] | siblings=[[Halfred Gamgee|Halfred]], [[Daisy Gamgee|Daisy]], [[May Gamgee|May]], [[Samwise Gamgee|Samwise]] and [[Marigold Gamgee|Marigold]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Hamson Gamgee''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Hamson was the eldest son of [[Gaffer Gamgee|Hamfast Gamgee]] and [[Bell Goodchild]]. He moved to [[Tighfield]] to work with his uncle [[Andwise Roper|Andwise]] as a roper.{{App|Gamgee}} ==Etymology== The name means "Son of Ham", referring to his father, [[Gaffer Gamgee|Hamfast]].[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names" {{References}} [[Category:Hobbits]] [[Category:Gamgee]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[de:Hamsen Gamdschie]] [[fi:Haminpoika Gamgi]]
